name: And-Kensaku
overview: "And-Kensaku" is a game where you can enjoy various word games by using the "number of hits" that shows how many words and phrases are used on the Internet. Play while thinking about how a certain word is used, what kind of word is popular, popular topics, and possible combinations of words. You may also find a surprising gap with your image. Since the search data of more than 10,000 words and phrases is recorded in the game in advance, you can play without connecting to the Internet. You can also download the latest words, hits, and additional issues from time to time by connecting to the Internet, and enjoy information that reflects actual trends
